description: Gas configuration for AMM Trading Suite. All gas prices in Gwei, gasLimit in units.

notes.maxFeePerGas: Maximum total fee per gas in Gwei. Set to null for no limit (use network rate). Example: 50 means max 50 Gwei per gas unit.
notes.maxPriorityFeePerGas: Tip to validators in Gwei. Higher = faster inclusion. Typical values: 0.1-3 Gwei.
notes.gasLimit: Maximum gas units per transaction type. Transaction fails if it exceeds this limit.
